author: Open
title: Lloyd Business School
text:
Lloyd Business School has always been at the forefront of providing industry-relevant education, and its latest initiative, the Executive Education Programme (EEP), reaffirms this commitment. Designed for working professionals and industry practitioners, the EEP focuses on equipping participants with cutting-edge skills essential in today’s dynamic business environment.
Led by Prof. Vandana Arora Sethi, Chief Strategy Officer and Dr Neetu Kamra, Professor & Head Analytics at Lloyd, the EEP team comprises experienced academicians and industry experts who ensure the curriculum stays relevant and impactful. Recognizing the pressing need for continuous learning and skill enhancement, the program emphasizes areas that are reshaping industries—Data Analytics, Business Analytics, and FinTech.
The collaboration with IBM, a global technology leader, adds immense value to the program. Through this partnership, participants gain access to advanced tools, real-world case studies, and IBM-certified training modules.
LBSSpeaking about the program, Prof. Vandana Arora Sethi said, “The Executive Education Programme at Lloyd is designed to bridge the gap between what industries demand and what professionals need to succeed. Our focus is on providing practical, industry-aligned skills to mid-career professionals, aspiring leaders, and individuals looking to upskill in areas like analytics and FinTech. This program is for anyone ready to invest in their growth and stay ahead in today’s competitive landscape.”
SCHOOLTHE LEGACY OF EXCELLENCE
Anchored by visionary leadership, LBS has grown exponentially, reflecting its unwavering dedication to nurturing talent. From its humble beginnings to becoming a hub for over 8,500 students, the school embodies the spirit of progress and resilience.At Lloyd, education is not merely a means to an end—it is a transformative journey. It empowers students to dream beyond boundaries, act with conviction, and rise as global leaders. For those aspiring to be the architects of tomorrow’s business landscape, welcome to not just an institution; welcome to a gateway to infinite possibilities.*Unlock your potential with Lloyd’s Executive Education Programme—Sharpening Skills for Today’s Dynamic Industries.
(A marketing initiative by Open Avenues)
